sect2.title: Installation of GNOME Session
sect2.para: Install GNOME Session by running the following commands:

userinput.command: export PATH=$PATH:`pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0`/sbin:/sbin && ./configure --prefix=`pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0` \ --localstatedir=/var/lib --sysconfdir=/etc/gnome && make && make install
